name: The Skirmish (itch)
description:
Captain Gorgutz needs your help in his campaign against the Imperium. With a fleet awaiting your orders, fight your way through the stars in a quest for stellar booty!

A tactical space shooter game  made for the Mini Jam 28: Pirates.
I didn't know that I could make such a game alone in just three days. This is my first jam and second completed game.

Controls:
WASD / arrows / middle mouse button - move the camera
scroll wheel - zoom in/out
ESC - pause
rest explained in game

All feedback will be appreciated! Have fun!
